Automatic Scissors: Create a pair of scissors that automatically close when not in use, preventing accidental cuts or injuries.
Smart Scissors: Develop a pair of scissors with a built-in sensor that detects the user's grip, adjusting the cutting force accordingly to prevent accidents.
Scissors with a built-in LED Light: Incorporate an LED light into the scissors, making them easier to see and use in low-light conditions.
Scissors with a built-in Bluetooth: Create a pair of scissors that can be controlled wirelessly via a Bluetooth device, providing hands-free operation.
Scissors with a built-in Camera: Develop a pair of scissors with a built-in camera, allowing the user to take pictures of the cutting process or the final result.
